name: Wildkin 28081 Olive Kids Mermaids Nap Mat

reviews.name: Wildkin Olive Kids Mermaids Nap Mat
reviews.reviewText: Our 16 month old daughter loves it. I send it to daycare and other Moms have told me this brand holds up well to washing each week. I love the removable pillow for that reason also.
reviews.title: My daughter loves it!

reviews.name: Wildkin Olive Kids Mermaids Nap Mat
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful nap mat. My preschooler is loving it. It is very durable even after washing it. Great quality. I like the fact that I don't have to worry about a blanket or pillow because they are attached to mat. I would definately recommend to family and friends!
reviews.title: Nap mat

reviews.name: Wildkin Olive Kids Mermaids Nap Mat
reviews.reviewText: My pre-k daughter loves her mermaid nap mat. My daughter loves that it roles up and has velcro snaps and a handle to carry it. I love the removable pillow and the attached blanket. So easy to wash.
reviews.title: Great nap mat.
